biotools.summary: Six frame nucleotide sequence translation, with ORF finding. The tool reads a DNA sequence and outputs the three forward and (optionally) three reverse translations in a visual manner.

bioschemas.name: sixpack (EBI)
bioschemas.summary: Six frame nucleotide sequence translation, with ORF finding. The tool reads a DNA sequence and outputs the three forward and (optionally) three reverse translations in a visual manner.
